about_the_game:
* Demo only features partial content of this game.

Plot Introduction

This story consists of the journey of three different characters. A young girl who insists that she is the real Hua Tuo, a teenager Zhang Zhongjing who becomes confused about himself, and Dong Feng, a medical master who wrote the "Green Bag Book" and the "Treatise on Typhoid and Miscellaneous Diseases". Mysterious illnesses swept across the divine state, leading to disasters and wars. In this era, death might just be a relief for all beings. After various griefs and sacrifices, the protagonists stumble to the end and put an end to the culprits of all disasters.

Gameplay

The game is divided into a card-based plot adventure AVG - "see and hear", a variety of puzzle puzzle mini-games - "lineage ", and the background explanation of the game setting - "handwritten notes" three parts. We hope to bring you an immersive gaming experience. During the journey, you will save patients of all kinds while traveling around Cao Cao, Yuan Shao and other forces, waiting for the opportunity to find the huge conspiracy hidden behind the epidemic.
